articles.title: Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang makes Barcelona debut in clinical win over Atletico Madrid - European round-up - Sky Sports
articles.description: Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang made a winning start to his Barcelona career as his new side beat Atletico Madrid 4-2 to move into La Liga's top four.
